ChunkText: please note this option is unfortunately not available for students from countries considered by the US government to be state sponsors of terrorism.
ContextBefore: please request a letter from isss if you plan to use this method of travel, as sometimes the border guards dont recall this exception and a letter that cites this regulation will help make sure you have a smooth return to the us.
ContextAfter: please read more about automatic visa revalidation, and see the list of eligible destinations please also note this rule is only for re-entry to the us, and does not play a role in allowing you to enter the country you plan to visit.
